title: I Arbitrarily Hate Roughly Half Of You

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a role each night. You will attack a random player who has that role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know all roles in the game at the start of the game, but not who has which.
- You may not directly share the information you gained from your first attribute, however you may do so partially and indirectly (such as claiming to be 566: Generic Town Role 2 and stating that a certain role is in the game).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate Lunari, Accent, Oct2, Bionic, Jd, Noodle, Robotica, Del, Mac, Wolfi, and Action, not counting yourself if you're one of those players.

desc:
Post 2088
*Honestly, Igu? Can't stand that bitch, either.*
